reviewText:
I have been looking for this movie saw it on cable years and years ago
good entertaining movie love it

I watched this movie as a teenager and love it- somehow I could not forget it and I have been searching, but all in vain! I am now in my 40's and is curretnly making a collection of old movie favourites,in dvd format. My Collection is incomplete without this movie, (which  I just stumbled on, in VHS format on Amazon.com) THerefore I am kindly requesting that the powers that be put this one on dvd. We are an aging population now, and I think this relaxing love comedy (from my recollection) would be nice to put on now and then.
Caribbean Woman
The beautiful,sexy Lucie Arnaz rules in this romantic comedy. It's amust see and please put on DVD!!!
